types:type.name: outputpayload
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type outputpayload = {| result: Array<{| s_no: Number {"typeId": "int"}, source: String, target: String, conversion_rate: Number {"typeId": "double"}, date_created: String, date_modified: String |}> |} {"example": "{\"result\":[{\"s_no\":1,\"source\":\"CAD\",\"target\":\"PHP\",\"conversion_rate\":38.94,\"date_created\":\"2019-12-09 00:00:00\",\"date_modified\":\"2019-12-09 00:00:00\"},{\"s_no\":2,\"source\":\"CAD\",\"target\":\"INR\",\"conversion_rate\":45.94,\"date_created\":\"2019-12-09 00:00:00\",\"date_modified\":\"2019-12-09 00:00:00\"}]}"}
